title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant (Go High Level Expert)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a highly skilled and proactive Real Estate Virtual Assistant with expertise in Go High Level (GHL) to support our marketing and client engagement efforts. If you have a strong background in real estate, are tech-savvy, and know how to make campaigns convert — this might be the perfect fit for you!

TO APPLY KINDLY ATTACH YOUR RESUME LINK AND PORTFOLIO LINK 

What You’ll Do:
-Run and manage marketing campaigns using Go High Level.
-Interact with leads and clients through automated and direct responses.
-Promote client events and property updates across social platforms.
-Handle social media advertising, including campaign setup, targeting, and optimization.
-Use AI tools and auto-responders within GHL to manage communication efficiently.
-Support real estate operations with your industry knowledge and admin experience.

TO APPLY KINDLY ATTACH YOUR RESUME LINK AND PORTFOLIO LINK 

What We’re Looking For:
-Proficiency in Go High Level is a must
-Proven experience as a Real Estate Virtual Assistant
-Comfortable with client interaction and online communication
-Knowledge of running Facebook/Instagram ads
-Ability to manage multiple campaigns and tasks efficiently
-Strong English communication skills, written and verbal
-Available to work night shift (PST hours)
